channel.title: Server help plz?
channel.description: Alright i was just playing on my server created on the weekend and it worked perfectly my friend was connecting everything was good. all of a sudden :eek: :eek: . no1 can connect anymore only me and if i wanna conect have to type 127.0.0.1 its retarted. i thought it was my client or something like that but i went on moparcape client and same thing happened no 1 can connect. Any1 know why and btw No-ip thing is on...

item.title: Server help plz?
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Public, your firewall isn’t needed to be off, you just need to allow the certain ports through your firewall.
